name: WWV
uniques: Instantly provides [8] [War Weariness] <upon being defeated> <in [Friendly Land] tiles> <when at war>
Instantly provides [20] [War Weariness] <upon being defeated> <in [non-[Friendly Land]] tiles> <when at war>
Instantly provides [150] [War Weariness] <upon conquering a city>
Instantly consumes [12] [War Weariness] <upon defeating a [non-[Barbarians]] unit> <in [Friendly Land] tiles>
Instantly consumes [10] [War Weariness] <upon defeating a [non-[Barbarians]] unit> <in [non-[Friendly Land]] tiles>

name: Fearless
uniques: Instantly provides [50] [War Weariness] <upon conquering a city>
Instantly consumes [30] [War Weariness] <upon defeating a [non-[Barbarians]] unit> <in [Friendly Land] tiles>
Instantly consumes [20] [War Weariness] <upon defeating a [non-[Barbarians]] unit> <in [non-[Friendly Land]] tiles>
